signature: SortedBag<E> transformingSortedBag(SortedBag<E>, Transformer<? super E, ? extends E>)

direct_enhancements.method_name: transformingBag(Bag<E>, Transformer<? super E, ? extends E>)
direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods transform elements in a bag using a transformer, with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods modify the behavior of a sorted bag, one using a transformer and the other using a predicate.
Both methods return a modified version of a sorted bag, with synchronizedSortedBag ensuring thread safety.
Both methods return a modified version of a sorted bag, with unmodifiableSortedBag ensuring the bag cannot be modified.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing an empty sorted bag can be used to set up the test environment for transformingSortedBag.
